name: History
description: Explore the past and uncover the stories of ancient civilizations, significant events, and influential figures that shaped the world we live in today.

name: Sci-fi
description: Immerse yourself in a world of futuristic technology, interstellar travel, and mind-bending concepts as you journey through the realms of science fiction.

name: Fashion
description: From haute couture to everyday style, delve into the world of fashion design, iconic photography, trends, and the art of dressing with flair and creativity.

name: Drama
description: Experience the power of storytelling through theatrical masterpieces, behind-the-scenes glimpses of Broadway, powerful monologues
